21.4. Supervised Learning Data Representation 432
Ideally, learning methods could be used that automatically learn the features required
to make accurate predictions from the raw data directly. This would allow new problems,
new datasets, and new sensor modalities to be adopted quickly and cheaply. Recently, deep
neural network models have started delivering on their promises of feature learning and are
